topic.title: POST MORTEM CONFIRMED NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS DIAGNOSIS INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether a Post Mortem confirmed a previous PATIENT DIAGNOSIS of Necrotising Enterocolitis.
